com.intechcore.scomponents.scell.api.spreadsheet

Interface ISpreadsheetApiProvider


  • public interface ISpreadsheetApiProvider
    The Core SCell Public API entry point provider

    Returns the API entry point IWorkbook

    Creates a new SCell document or loads existing

    Can be obtained from IScellApiResolver: 

    
 ScellApiProvider.getApiResolverAsync().thenAccept(apiResolver -> {
     ISpreadsheetApiProvider coreApiProvider = apiResolver.resolve(ISpreadsheetApiProvider.class);
     // ...
 });

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompletableFuture<IWorkbook> createNew()
      Creates a new document

      Loads an existing spreadsheet file
      CompletableFuture<IWorkbook> load(InputStream inputStream, Supplier<String> passwordSupplier, String title)
      Loads document as stream

    • Method Detail

      • createNew

        CompletableFuture<IWorkbook> createNew()
        Creates a new document
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture of the IWorkbook to be async
        See Also:
        IWorkbook

      • load

        CompletableFuture<IWorkbook> load(File file,
                                  Supplier<String> passwordSupplier)
        Loads an existing spreadsheet file
        Parameters:
        file - File existing xlsx file
        passwordSupplier - lambda to provide the password if the file is protected
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture of loaded document to be async
        See Also:
        IWorkbook

      • load

        CompletableFuture<IWorkbook> load(InputStream inputStream,
                                  Supplier<String> passwordSupplier,
                                  String title)
        Loads document as stream
        Parameters:
        inputStream - InputStream of xlsx-content to open
        passwordSupplier - lambda to provide the password if the stream is protected
        title - document title
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture loaded document to be async
        See Also:
        IWorkbook
